title: Avani Modi: Wanted to be Size Zero
text:
Photos 
Avani Modi who made her Bollywood debut with Madhur Bhandarkar’s Calendar Girls, has a body to die for. Previously seem in A few Telugu and Tamil flick and commercials, Avani is all for yoga and meditation. The unconventional beauty shares her fitness secrets. 
Fitness philosophy 
Be positive and stay calm. Eat healthy food and drink lots of water. 
Diet: I am a pure vegetarian. My breakfast includes lukewarm water with lemon and honey. I eat lots of fruits, brown bread toast and milk. My lunch comprises vegetables, roti, curds and a salad. And I prefer eating less at dinner - just khichdi or sabzi-roti. But I drink a lot of water and green tea. 
Love training: 
I love to work on my abs. 
Working out 
makes you feel 
I feel calm and energetic after workouts. I also love meditation and yoga. And on days like Sundays, when I don’t workout, I feel lazy. 
Did you change your fitness regimen for Calendar Girls? 
I wanted to be size zero for the film. 
Bollywood actors (male and female) with fittest bodies: 
Hrithik Roshan, John Abraham and Akshay Kumar and in females it is Shilpa Shetty, Deepika Padukone and Priyanka Chopra who I feel are the fittest in the industry. 
Your best body feature 
My long, shiny and lustrous mane and my eyes. 
Started working out at the age of: 
I hit the gym when I was 19. 
Was inspired to exercise by 
I started exercising after watching Shilpa Shetty. 
First workout 
I was crazy about gym but later I switched to yoga. 
The best compliment for your fitness 
When my co-stars in “Calendar Girls” were jealous of me because they were dieting and I was allowed to eat! 
Relationship between fitness and health 
If you are fit, you are also healthy. But it’s important to stay healthy both mentally and physically especially when you are an actor. 
Relationship between fitness and self-confidence 
If you are fit, your confidence will reflect on your face. You become sure of yourself. 
Opinion on the six pack and the size zero trends 
Though size zero never worked for me but I like six pack abs on guys. 
Fitness advice 
Know your body type before working out or imitating your idols. It is important to know what your food habits are and what profession you belong to. Don’t follow anyone blindly.
